ISSUE.TITLE: Sendinblue plugin should not throw the "synchronization error: Plugin not configured" (when it's not configured)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: These errors will be added the log right after installation of nopCommerce. We should not throw this error when the plugin is not configured. Let's just ignore it (exit from the appropriate schedule task)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5212 Sendinblue plugin should not throw the "synchronization error: Plugin not configured" (when it's not configured)
